With extensive experience, deep knowledge and worldwide presence across financial markets, LSEG enable businesses and economies around the world to fund innovation, manage risk and create jobs. LSEG delivers financial data, analytics, news and index products to more than 40.000 customers in 190 countries.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":57957,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/13bee8e0-0ce0-4319-b2c3-b46b8919addf/MicrosoftTeams-image (61).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/13bee8e0-0ce0-4319-b2c3-b46b8919addf/MicrosoftTeams-image (61).png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (61).png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (61).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"13bee8e0-0ce0-4319-b2c3-b46b8919addf\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":151},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HISTORY\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"London Stock Exchange is one of the worldâ€™s oldest stock exchanges and can trace its history back more than 300 years. London Stock Exchange Group was created in October 2007 when London Stock Exchange merged with Milan Stock Exchange, Borsa Italiana.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Jan 2021 LSEG completes the all-share acquisition of Refinitiv to create a leading global financial markets infrastructure and data provider.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WHAT WE DO\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We equip the financial community with advanced technology, data and expertise.
